DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety tolerability Vortioxetine period 52 week patient Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) complete 6-week acute treatment study NCT00839423 / 11492A .
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Safety Extension Study 5 10 mg Vortioxetine ( Lu AA21004 ) Long-term Treatment Major Depressive Disorder Adults
DOC.criteria: Patients complete 6week shortterm treatment study Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) , NCT00839423 / 11492A , follow 2week taper period Any current psychiatric disorder MDD define Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIV TR ) Female patient childbearing potential use effective contraception Use psychoactive medication Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
